}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== Test data is reused from the '''[[InFocus INA-WIFIUSB-4]]''' which appears to be identical.
<small> A ''Device only can be used on TV Letter'' submitted to the FCC says, "[.] for HDMI display only :and Notebook cannot recognize the dongle when it is plugged into the Notebook. ::Also, we will not release device driver for direct NB application(s) or similar." </small>
{{FCC ST|07/30/2019|indexme.}} {{See also|TechInfoDepot:Network/Hardware Specific/CC&C|CC&C}}
